tags.name: linebreak

optional.name: array3[1]

required.description: Formula string to evaluate

tags.name: yAdj

optional.name: array3[1]
optional.description: Grid snap value in pixels (float). Centers are rounded to nearest multiple of this value

optional.name: array3[2]
optional.description: Total width to center within (float). Defaults to getWidth() if not specified

tags.name: center2Digit
tags.description: Centers text assuming it's a 2-digit number. Adjusts position for single-digit numbers to align properly. Removes spaces from first text element.

tags.name: rightAdjusted
tags.description: Right-aligns all previously rendered text by shifting positions based on content width. Aligns to even pixel boundaries.

tags.name: adjXScaled
tags.description: Adjusts X offset and reduces maxWidth based on screen scale. Adds horizontal padding that scales with screen size. Adds 20px at scale > 1, otherwise 0.25 * (screenWidth - 800) capped at 0.

tags.name: adjYScaled
tags.description: Adjusts Y offset for text and images when screen scale > 1. Sets both zero.Y and zero2.Y to -90 if scale > 1.

tags.name: adjMaxWidth
tags.description: Adjusts the maximum width by adding a specified value scaled by tooltip scale factor.

required.name: array3[1]

tags.description: Conditionally displays text based on formula evaluation. Shows text only if formula result > 0.

required.name: array3[2]
required.description: Formula condition - text displays only if result > 0

tags.name: textIfElse

required.name: array3[3]
required.description: Formula condition - determines which text to show

required.name: array3[1]

required.name: array3[2]
required.description: Formula condition - text displays and processing stops only if result > 0

required.description: Actor ID to get trivia for

tags.name: favAbils
tags.description: Displays icons of an actor's 5 most frequently used abilities. Shows action icons with class-specific color palettes. Clears all text/textures if actor not found.

required.name: array3[1]
required.description: Actor ID to show favorite abilities for

tags.name: journalEntries
tags.description: Displays the total count of known journal entries as a number.

tags.name: enemiesDefeated
tags.description: Displays the total count of all enemies defeated across all actor types. Sums all values in killsOfActorType dictionary.

tags.name: partyKOs
tags.description: Displays the total count of knockouts across all party members (active, barracks, dead, and missing). Sums timesKOd for all actors.

tags.name: partyDeaths
tags.description: Displays the count of dead party members. Shows size of partyActors_dead list.

tags.name: g
tags.description: Gets and displays a global variable value as string. Empty string if array3.Length <= 1.

optional.name: array3[1]
optional.description: Global variable name to retrieve

tags.name: gNot0
tags.description: Gets and displays a global variable value as string, but only if the value is not '0'. Empty string if value is '0' or variable doesn't exist.

optional.name: array3[1]
optional.description: Global variable name to retrieve

tags.name: overworldPos
tags.description: Displays the player's current position on the overworld as latitude/longitude coordinates. Uses player position if in 'eral' zone, otherwise uses current location coordinates. Empty if game not loaded.

tags.name: clockhand
tags.description: Displays a clock icon showing the current time of day. Shows one of 24 hour positions (ui_dayTime0 through ui_dayTime23).

tags.name: days
tags.description: Displays the current day number (world time days + 1, as integer).

tags.name: getHourMinTime
tags.description: Displays the current time in hour:minute format. Uses GameState.getHourMinTime() method.

tags.name: dayname
tags.description: Displays the name of the current day of the week. Uses GameState.whatDayIsIt().name method.

tags.name: wind
tags.description: Displays a wind direction icon. Shows 'wind_none' if windRot is -360, otherwise shows directional wind icon snapped to nearest 45-degree increment.

tags.name: crewmorale
tags.description: Displays crew morale icon (0-19 scale based on morale/5). In fun mode, has 10% chance to show random negative morale. Shows crewmorale0 through crewmorale19 icons.

tags.name: food
tags.description: Displays food supply icon showing days of food remaining (0-9 scale). Calculates food count divided by daily consumption. Icon turns red (pLaser) when at 0 days. Shows ui_food0 through ui_food9.

tags.name: escortInfo
tags.description: Displays escort mission info showing faction icon and ship count. Only shows if escort was assigned less than 721 world time units ago. Parses playerEscort global variable.

tags.name: escortTime
tags.description: Displays remaining time for escort mission in days. Shows format '(Xd)' where X is days remaining. Only shows if time remaining > 0. Max duration is 721 world time units.

tags.name: XPbreakdown
tags.description: Displays detailed XP gain breakdown for all crew members who gained XP. Groups crew by XP amount gained, shows portraits and XP values. Compares current XP to stored baseline. Multi-line formatted output.

tags.name: rFX
tags.description: Sets the reveal effect for text animation. Stores effect name in revealFX variable.

required.name: array3[1]
required.description: Reveal effect name/identifier

tags.name: palette
tags.description: Displays a palette swatch at 1x scale. Shows both a colored bar (pixel texture) and the actual palette colors. Positioned at specific offsets (-316,22 for bar, -50,10 for palette).

required.name: array3[1]
required.description: Palette name in Data.palettes dictionary

tags.name: paletteBig
tags.description: Displays a palette swatch at 2x scale. Shows colored bar and palette colors at larger size. Positioned at specific offsets (-316,22 for bar, -252,60 for palette). Advances X position by 32 pixels.

required.name: array3[1]
required.description: Palette name in Data.palettes dictionary

tags.name: command
tags.description: Adds a custom command to the commands list at current position. Stores the full tag text (text3) as command. Advances position by tiny amount (1E-05 pixels).

commands.name: globalAdd
commands.description: Modifies a global variable by adding an integer value to it. Uses Game1.currentGameState.modGlobalVar().

required.name: array[2]
required.description: Global variable name to modify

required.name: array[3]
required.description: Integer value to add to the global variable

commands.name: money
commands.description: Adds money to the player's current money total. Can be negative to subtract money.

required.name: array[2]
required.description: Integer amount of money to add (can be negative)

commands.name: fame
commands.description: Modifies the player's fame with a specific faction. Uses Game1.currentGameState.modFame().

required.name: array[2]
required.description: Faction ID

required.name: array[3]
required.description: Integer fame value to add (can be negative)

commands.name: favor
commands.description: Modifies the player's favor with a specific faction. Uses Game1.currentGameState.modFavor().

required.name: array[2]
required.description: Faction ID

required.name: array[3]
required.description: Integer favor value to add (can be negative)

commands.name: dmgNum
commands.description: Displays a damage number (floating text) at the current position on screen. Uses UIManager.I.addDamageNumber().

required.name: array[2]
required.description: Text to display as damage number

commands.name: task
commands.description: Creates and executes a task immediately. Creates a new Task object and calls executeTask() with zero coordinates.

required.name: array[2]
required.description: Comma-separated task string to execute

commands.name: pause
commands.description: Pauses execution by adjusting the timer. Subtracts (array[2] * 5) from the timer value.

required.name: array[2]
required.description: Pause duration (float). Multiplied by 5 before subtracting from timer

commands.name: fx
commands.description: Adds a visual effect to the render queue at the current text position. Uses Camera.addFXtoQueue() with 'White' color.

required.name: array[2]
required.description: Effect ID/name to add to queue

required.name: array[2]
required.description: Sound effect ID to play

commands.name: advanceDialog
commands.description: Advances dialog automatically after a specified delay.

required.name: array[2]
required.description: Delay in seconds (float) before advancing dialog

commands.name: openJournal
commands.description: Opens the journal to a specific entry. Centers window, disables interaction, plays page flip sound, and optionally shows page turn effect.

required.name: array[2]
required.description: Journal entry ID to open to

tags.description: Empty tag name (bare equals sign with no tag). Displays a literal '=' character.
